author: Nicole Mortillaro
title: Biodiversity loss and wildlife trade are making pandemics like COVID-19 more likely, experts say
description: The destruction of natural habitats are making it easier for pathogens, like the novel coronavirus, to cross into humans, scientists say.
content:
In Brazil, wide swaths of rainforest are being decimated for logging and farmland. In Asia, animals are being collected in the wild and sold in markets. In Africa, some animals are hunted down to near-extinction for their so-called medicinal qualities.
